ack.p: This work was supported by the National Natural Science of Foundation of China (Grant No. 51434008), the Strategic Priority Research Program on Space Science, the Chinese Academy of Sciences (Grant No. XDA04020411, XDA04020202-11), the Program of “One Hundred Talented People” of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, and the Chinese Scholarship Council (CSC). J.E. acknowledges additional support from the German Science Foundation (DFG) under the Leibniz Program (grant EC111/26-1), the European Research Council under the ERC Advanced Grant INTELHYB (grant ERC-2013-ADG-340025).
